website_summaries.verdict: The Milliard Premium bed is comfortable and durable. Its easy assembly and quick setup makes it a good choice for a guest bed.
pros: The Milliard Premium Folding Bed has a memory foam mattress and a poly deck support
It has a top strap to hold the bed together while it is folded, and the only assembly needed is to attach the wheels
cons: Some users have reported the springs may pop off with constant use

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, attractive, convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and perfect for our out of town guests. When folded up, this takes up about the same space as an old fashioned steam radiator. Doesn't look too bad either. I particularly like that this supports a range of body sizes - many of the other folding beds here have a top weight limit around 250-300. This was also EXTREMELY simple to get set up and to fold up and down every day, particularly because the legs automatically come down when you start to unfold it. I slept on this twice myself and it is very comfortable - not bars or ridges in your back at all. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: redhed

customer_reviews.title: Get this one!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! Bed is comfortable, easy to fold up, easy to store and easy to move. I shopped around quite a bit and was torn between several different brands before deciding on this one. I am using it for every day use and it is very comfortable. I live in a very small apartment and storing the bed is not an issue at all. I would highly recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G.

customer_reviews.title: This Millard folding bed was much better construction. The mattress was thicker
customer_reviews.text: Quality, well made. I bought 3 fold-up beds for guests. Two were Millard's, one was a little cheaper but similar design. This Millard folding bed was much better construction. The mattress was thicker, even though they claimed the same depth. The only setup is to screw the wheels on. Very easy set up. This bed is well worth the money. I am 55, 165 lbs, and a poor quality bed can cause me back pain for days. I took this bed camping and had no problems .
customer_reviews.author: tdiver

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Revised review. Finally got around to using the bed. 5 springs popped out and the bed is useless. May be ok for child but not a medium size adult. Very disappointed that it would not last more than a couple of uses for the price. Too late to return. Bad purchase. This is REAL review!
customer_reviews.author: JJP

customer_reviews.title: He loves it and says it is extremely comfortable to sleep on
customer_reviews.text: My husband injured his leg and was unable to climb the stairs, so I purchased this so he would have a bed for a 12 week healing process. He loves it and says it is extremely comfortable to sleep on. In week 8 a spring snapped off. Now in week 10, there are 4 springs that have broken off. I'm hoping to find replacement ones to fix the bed. My husband is 6' 1" and about 195, so he isn't over max weight. Not sure why the springs snapped (all on one side towards the center).
customer_reviews.author: Jrod

customer_reviews.title: Was quite disappointed in this bed
customer_reviews.text: Was quite disappointed in this bed. After only a week, some of the springs broke. You need to please specify the weight you feel it should hold. From prior reviews, I thought it would hold 200-225 pounds. It did not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bed is extremely comfortable. Unfortunately the springs which tension the support tend ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and set up was a breeze. The mattress expanded quickly and without fumes. The bed is extremely comfortable. Unfortunately the springs which tension the support tend to break with normal use. The bed should come with spares if they continue to use these springs.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Sicher

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed! I purchased this bed because my mom ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Bed! I purchased this bed because my mom needs help getting in and out of bed and forgets to call me for help. I bought this bed so that I could set it up every night in her room for me. It folds up easily, rolls easily to where I store it, and is very comfortable. I normally sleep on a memory foam mattress with a frame that adjusts to zero gravity and massages. I have a bad back, and have not had problems from sleeping on this folding bed. It is very roomy and the mattress is firm and does not sag.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this bed
customer_reviews.text: This is suppose to be a top rated bed. Save your money. Screws and springs break and the bed is trash. For the price of the bed should last longer than a few months. Use cheap components and you get a cheap product!
customer_reviews.author: cONNIE hOLLAND

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Two springs broke in less than two months, it is very uncomfortable now
customer_reviews.author: masha22

customer_reviews.title: Works for us just fine
customer_reviews.text: We have found this bed to be quite good. My 6'2" son, when he visits, hangs over the end a bit but it's otherwise comfortable for him. I have also used it on a couple of occasions. Slight back ache in the morning, which I think is because I'm used to sleeping on a very high quality and firm mattress. But I since this cost much less, it's not a fair compare. This bed does what it should, which is to provide good comfort for short-time visitors. Then it folds up quickly and rolls out of the way. Came packaged very well. There are a few pinch points that you need to watch out for as you unfold/fold.
customer_reviews.author: BeHappy

customer_reviews.title: It Could Be Wider
customer_reviews.text: The bed is very comfortable , according to everyone who has slept on it . It was very easy to put the wheels on and it folds up easily . The only thing that I am disappointed in , is the fact that it is not as wide as a twin bed which makes it hard to find a fitted sheet that will fit . It is a very sturdy bed , though , and overall , I like it .
customer_reviews.author: Debby Day

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: The bed is everything I expected it to be when I bought it. Our bedrooms are on the second floor and my wife recently had a foot injury and could not climb stairs. The bed enabled her to sleep downstairs. It is comfortable, easy to put together, and is well-made. The bed was purchased for temporary use and is more comfortable than sleeping on a couch, but it is not a substitute for your regular bed.
customer_reviews.author: Wimdaz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic purchase. I don't give five stars lightly. The cot does not sag when I sleep on it, and I weigh 255 lbs. Yes, I wish the bed were higher off the ground, but my budget was for something excellent on which to sleep. If you're looking for luxury in a cot-sized bed such as this (or another fold-up bed), you're welcome to spend a whole lot money on something else. Also, expect such a bed to take up more space when folded out AND when folded up.
customer_reviews.author: Lyam

customer_reviews.title: Milliard Premium Folding Bed with Foam Mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bed I have purchased - that is how much I like this bed. I sleep on it when my 4 grandkids come from out of state; I find it very convenient and also very comfortable. (My husband and I give up our bedroom to our daughter and son-in-law and toddler.) The second bed is for a grandchild who would otherwise have to sleep on the floor in their room. These beds stay so clean under the cover I also purchased, and they store nicely in a closet. Rolling them around is also an easy plus feature of this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.text: Update: after talking to customer service, I'm expecting to receive two non locking wheels. This should take care of my issue. Excellent customer service!!!!! (I'd give it five stars if the wheels with brakes didn't catch in the carpet when rolling it.) Other than that, it seems sturdy and comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: sm

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: Look if you are having an overnight guest then this is a perfect purchase. If it is intended for someone on a long-term stay I would rethink the mattress. I have back issues and for me this did not work as well as I thought it would. This does NOT mean I regret the purchase as it will work great for any overnight company I may have just not for anyone wanting to stay longer .... remember this too depends on the individual. You may not have any back issues so it could work out great for you and based on that I would recommend this folding bed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Otano

customer_reviews.title: Seems good...
customer_reviews.text: The bed seems like it will hold up okay. The wheels are a little small to move it around over any carpets or thresholds, but it is light enough where you can pick it up easy enough. I would not call it premium, more like medium duty. The bolt on frame for the wheels is made of reasonably sturdy metal, but is could use a little more welding to stiffen it up, I am adding a piece of steel tubing to give it a little more rigidity. The mattress seems good, we will have to wait and see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Peter P.

customer_reviews.title: What a good surprise! So
customer_reviews.text: What a good surprise! So, this bed is my everyday bed! And I’m a heavy woman. The first night I decided it wasn’t good, but I gave it a second night chance and turns out to be really good for my back. I have a small apartment and I want something smaller and easy to hide when friends come over. That’s it. I recommend! It’s smaller than a regular twin mattress. But really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia B.

customer_reviews.title: Quick Extra Bed
customer_reviews.text: This has been a game changer in our guest bedroom-less house. I can set it up in the family room or the porch for a quiet retreat for out of town guests. We've also used it as "The Sick Bed." So when siblings that share a room or one of us gets a nasty night cough, everyone else can still get a decent night's sleep. Very comfortable--even as "The Sick Bed" it is not a downgrade or worse-off place to sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Mamashebear

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Guest who is about 150 pounds slept on it for Christmas Holidays. I just tested it today to avoid the lawn maintenance noise in my regular bedroom. It was just as comfortable as my Simmons pillow top bed. It is a little slim compared to a regular twin but for me, and I am 155 pounds, it was extremely comfortable. It's a lot easier than any of the other fold up beds to set up and close. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Twain

customer_reviews.title: and its not getting any better. The next revue
customer_reviews.text: I am still waiting for someone to send me the missing caster. Have you ever tried to sleep on a cot with a two inch drop I'm the middle on just one side of it. Well it is most uncomfortable, and its not getting any better. The next revue, if the problem will be one star or less.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Nance

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sturdy for tall guys, and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son that lives in a very small space. He is 6'5" tall and weighs about 200 -210 lbs. He said the he is so comfortable and it suits his body fine and he sleeps well. I also like that he has the option to fold it up and store it away when he needs the space. What also makes this great is that he said he only had to unfold the bed and pop the wheels in and screw to tighten it up. It was so simple to assemble. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TTouch

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress, but braces don't fit frame
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before landing on this bed. I need 5, but ordered just one to check the quality. The mattress and the frame are nice quality and the bed is comfortable. But the holes in the braces don't line up with the nuts on the frame. Since the nuts don't fit into the holes on the brace, the brace sits on top of the nuts, and then the bolts on the wheels aren't long enough to fully screw into the frame. I got it together, but I'm not sure how sturdy it will be. I like everything else about the bed, but I won't be buying the four more that I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good fix. I bought it for my visiting son to use at Thanksgiving and he said it was comfortable, but a little narrow. The fact that there isn't a cross bar is a definite plus! Only used it a couple of days, so no comment on comfort beyond that. It seems like it will last. Yes, it is fully assembled except for the wheels, which are not optional (they make the center of the bed even with the ends). The wrench for the wheels only sort of works and a standard wrench is a little tricky to get where you need it, but it is do-able. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David's sis

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality & Quick Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy assembly and best of all great to sleep on. Hint: If you cut along the bottom of the shipping box you can use the box as a sleeve to store the bed when not in use. This will keep it nice and clean for the next visitor.
customer_reviews.author: PAK

customer_reviews.title: Great extra bed, as good as a cot gets
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something for guest overflow, crossed my fingers and hoped they would be worth the price. Well I used them before we had our real beds delivered, for several nights, bad back and all, I slept fine as did my spouse. Several others have used them and everyone says the same thing. They were comfortable and slept well. Also very easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: FairweatherNine

customer_reviews.title: This bed is great. All you have to do is pop the ...
customer_reviews.text: This bed is great. All you have to do is pop the wheels on and its ready to go. It seems like a very sturdy bed to me. I did throw a 2 inch memory foam topper mattress on it becuase I found the mattress to be a little firmer than I like. Overall I absolutely love the bed!!! So easy to roll out, unfold and use and then fold back up roll it away into the closet for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Not for 'large' people
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time - easy set up and the mattress is pretty comfortable. Very simple to fold up and roll away. However my husband tried it out - he's not a big guy - weighs 180 - 3 springs broke after one night!! I ordered replacement springs (cheaper than shipping cost to send it back). I guess they sell replacement springs in all sizes so this sort of must happen. I'm having company this weekend -keeping my fingers crossed that the new springs hold.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Although her only complaint was that it would be better for her
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for a niece that was going to be visiting for a week with us, and she has arthritis and claimed she slept well on it. Although her only complaint was that it would be better for her, if it was a little higher off the ground. I also would like to see a way that there could be a higher end/bar to keep the pillows from falling off. Comfort seems to be ok and love the light weight of it and easy folding and storing.
customer_reviews.author: bjeva

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Guest Bed!
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter outgrew her toddler bed but this sturdy, well-constructed folding bed tucked into the same spot beautifully. It was all the positive reviews that helped me decide on this model over cheaper ones at discount stores - and I’m glad we did! She’ll be able to sleep on it until she’s 30! Perfectly comfortable for an adult. Great mattress, and no assembly! Wheels just screw into the frame. Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Denise K. Maguire

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than air mattress
customer_reviews.text: The shipment was on time and easy to assemble. This is way better than an air mattress and takes up little space in the garage. I keep it covered with a shipping blanket while storing. My 21 year old daughter (5'3 115-ish) slept on this for a week while grandma visited and it was perfect and comfy. Easy to pull out and ready for guest to crash for the night if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Medina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great extra bed for guests. I find it very comfortable myself. The mattress is quite thick The bed does not sag in the middle. It is sturdy and folds easily to store. i got the cover too. makes it even better to store. i just leave sheets and a blanket on, fold it up if not using, cover and it is ready for the next time. A little more $ then many rollaways but a good investment for the living space Handy to have available!
customer_reviews.author: Marenann L.

customer_reviews.title: Very good portable bed
customer_reviews.text: I wrote this comment after using it for 1 year. The bed is really comfortable and robust. My daughter sleeps on it everyday. We carry it in our SUV when going out for travel, that's why we bought a portable bed. We've been using it along Grand Circle, in the round trip to Oregon and Washington, In Las Vegas and San Diego, etc. The only thing needs to improve is, the screw is easy to get loosen, it would be better to put a pad there to keep all the screws tight.
customer_reviews.author: Purplexsu

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable ..
customer_reviews.text: I needed an extra bed for guest and wanted something they would be comfortable on... I opened the package and screwed in wheels which took seconds and layed on it ... Wow!!!!!! This bed is amazingly comfortable so glad I went with this brand.. I have and old one that doesn’t even come close to this .. totally different level. I’m 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my child
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bed smaller than a twin and longer than a toddler bed. This works perfect. It’s low to the floor, yet not too wide. It only too a few minutes to screw the wheels on and it was ready. The box did come broken, so I was nervous but the bed was fine. It folds away very easily. Just lift both sides (very lightweight) and snap it together. The memory foam is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: FOLDAWAY BED
customer_reviews.text: Good quality; very easy to assemble. Although this looks like a twin mattress at 39" wide, this is a cot at 30" wide by 6' long. Removable, washable cover is very nice. I wish it was higher from the floor, but that would make its portability more difficult. This was a better alternative for me than buying a twin mattress set, headboard etc because I hate accumulating many items for sporadic events in my life.
customer_reviews.author: carmella lonzi

customer_reviews.title: Ideal - easy fold up bed
customer_reviews.text: Ideal - easy fold up bed. Perfect and comfortable too!! Yes I highly recommend it. Excellent quality - worth the extra $$.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Broken springs after 1st use
customer_reviews.text: Just folded up bed from having a holiday guest here for 4 weeks and noticed 5 springs are broken. The hook is broken off one side of the spring so they are just hanging on the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The pros is that is easy to roll around and move the cons is it ...
customer_reviews.text: The pros is that is easy to roll around and move the cons is it rolls around and moves .I tried to lock the wheels in place but had no luck with it locking in place so when my guest moves in the bed the actual bed moves too. The memory mattress was nice in the beginning but now with weekly use the middle of the mattress has an indent
customer_reviews.author: Janette Pulice

customer_reviews.title: Came with crooked screw holes
customer_reviews.text: Looked perfect and easy to assemble....but the screw holes in the bed itself are crooked...cannot screw on the wheels properly. tried to adjust the holes in the wheel brackets, but a no go. I would have sent it back if I didn't have company coming the following day. I slept on it with two pieces of a 4x4 under it, where the wheels should have been. Now stuck with a bed that without wheels.
customer_reviews.author: John Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter who is five and has recently become a partial quadriplegic, meaning we needed a bed small enough to fit next to ours so we could keep an eye on her overnight. It works well for her, but I have also slept on it and it was a great bed. It is sturdy, easy to fold, and the mattress is much thicker and comfortable than we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Neeli Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Love these cots
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a second one of these cots along with covers. These cots are comfortable and easy to move around. Customer service is great. My second cot arrived without the wheels. I contacted customer service who were friendly, responsive, and subsequently mailed out the wheels in a timely manner. I would buy another should my family sleep overs increase.
customer_reviews.author: MACMUSICTHERAPY

customer_reviews.title: Very nice guest bed.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've purchased. This is a nice foldaway bed. Works great for both children and adults. Very comfortable and easy to use! No assembly except putting on the wheels. Very nice memory foam mattress and no bad odor. And is light enough we can carry up and down stairs as needed. Folds up easily and nice sturdy frame and rollers for moving.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy K

customer_reviews.title: Most comfirtabke fold away bed ever
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant. First the easiest set up ever. Just pop on the wheels and ready. Secondly it's so well made. Sturdy but yet extremely comfortable. I've already had company sleep in them and they were full of compliments. Definitely worth the extra money over air mattresses or cheaper brands. I would highly recommend this bed. Plus it folds away so easily. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Rollaway Bed
customer_reviews.text: We have gotten good use out of this very well made rollaway bed. Big enough for guest from our 6 year old grandson up to a 200 pound man, even our daughter who has some back problems likes it and says it is very comfortable. We use twin sheets and though the bottom sheet isn't a perfect fit, it tucks in just fine. The bed folds up easily and fits in a space between a wall and a desk, to allow for more room during the day in an office we use for a spare guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for small homes
customer_reviews.text: Much lower in height than I expected but it’s very easy to fold and unfold. Perfect for guests. Mattress is comfy but after long time use, it can and will feel worned out. Definitely buy the storage cover that comes with this (they sell it separately). It’s convenient for anybody with a small home. Easy put away and it has wheels so no scratches on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: AubreyLLA

customer_reviews.title: Broken springs
customer_reviews.text: The springs began breaking after 4 weeks of use, to the point that the beds are now totally useless. Extra heavy duty frame? Ha!
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Logulo

customer_reviews.title: Milliard Folding Bed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this folding bed for the upcoming holidays for company. Bed is very nice - all we had to do was screw in the wheels, unfold and it's good to go. The support legs at the head and foot open up as you unfold the bed. I laid on it a few minutes just to test and it felt pretty comfortable. I think it will work really well for temporary guests.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernBelle

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: It came on time and it was in great shape. just had to put wheels on. kids & I layed on them and thought they were very comfy. Guests who slept on them thought the cots were extremely comfortable. very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: jocelyn suglia

customer_reviews.title: it was an OK product!
customer_reviews.text: The matress appeared comfortable. Maybe I obese and the middle bar of the bed hurt my back. I had to use a Cushing between the back arch and the foundation to use the bed. I am recommending for the one-night situation but not a week or more. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Armantina R. Pelaez

customer_reviews.title: Lots of ZZZZZs ahead for our guests!
customer_reviews.text: The mattress on this bed is really great. The compression keeps it comfy, the frame and base are sturdy and weighted and guests can sleep well on these! The price was outstanding for the quality of this product. We expected to pay much more when we began our search, but the company, Home Wise, knows what they're doing with this bed! It's always enjoyable to review a good product - and this bed is super!
customer_reviews.author: readingreviewer5

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality construction
customer_reviews.text: the nuts welded to the bottom of the frame were misaligned, so both the braces and the wheel bowls could not be screwed in at the same time North straight. Happened on to identical bed models. I returned them after struggling 2 effects the wheels. See attached pictures. I emailed the company immediately and still haven't heard from them after 1 week. Poor quality control
customer_reviews.author: M3

customer_reviews.title: She thought it would be so uncomfortable but since she has been here she sleeps like a baby
customer_reviews.text: I got this bed for my mother when she visits and she loves it, she says her back doesn't hurt when wakes up which surprised her because of it being a fold away bed. She thought it would be so uncomfortable but since she has been here she sleeps like a baby!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Bad welding
customer_reviews.text: A huge issue we had was one side (where the rollers go) was welded poorly and stripped the wheels as we tried to wrench them in. I would have returned it but my mother needed someone to sleep in the room with her starting that night. We had to drill and saw for an hour to get the wheels on. What a hassle when you have a sick mother to worry about! Other than that it's fine 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Paula Richards

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This bed arrived very quickly and was packaged in a very sturdy way. I was surprised to see that it wasn't as large as a twin size bed, and is more like a cot size. That being said, I think it will work well for our rental property and for a child to sleep on. It is well made and easy to fold up to put away. The mattress seems like it would be very comfortable and has a nice cover on it. I might have missed something in the description that said it was a cot size instead of a twin size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... my son (home from college) found the rollaway just fine; but today 8 of the springs holding the ...
customer_reviews.text: Up until the second week my son (home from college) found the rollaway just fine; but today 8 of the springs holding the mattress support just broke on one side all at once - the break in the springs were all in the same place - looks like metal failure. I'm ordering replacement springs from another company because I expect the springs on the other side to break soon as well.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn R.

customer_reviews.title: PACKAGED LIKE GARBAGE - ARRIVED DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: We needed this for our daughter's friend that was going to stay with us for 2 weeks of the Christmas college vacation. The bed arrived bent which we realized after trying to put the wheels on for 30 minutes. Stay away - Poor quality and back it goes!!!
customer_reviews.author: ericknowsbest

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by how much I like this bed. I bought it so I would have a place to sleep for a week while I stayed at my daughters house after her son was born. I slept very well each night - can't really compare it to my queen sized temperpedic, but wasn't expecting it to be THAT comfortable. It is extremely easy to fold up and roll away - takes just seconds. I was able to fold up the sheet right inside of it. Instead of buying a cover, I just kept the box and popped it over the top. Perfect! The 5 stars are well deserved.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: We made a very good choice in buying this folding bed.
customer_reviews.text: I found the folding bed exactly what my wife and I needed for the occasional visit of family or friends. In our condo unit, it is the perfect size for our spare room where it fits nicely. When not in use for sleeping, it folds up easily and is kept in the same room. Our guests have found the bed very comfortable. A good choice on our part.
customer_reviews.author: James J. McGilvray

customer_reviews.title: So far I am pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far I am pleased with this purchase. I also purchased the cover, so as to keep the sheets and blankets free of dust, and was extremely happy with how it fit. I had plenty of room to cover the made up bed including a pillow. I would recommend this if you need an extra bed from time to time. The only thing to make this a full 5 stars for me, i’d would like to see a slip free cot so the mattress doesn’t migrate when using.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke  Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: This bed is perfect. I was only using it for occasional guests ...
customer_reviews.text: This bed is perfect. I was only using it for occasional guests such as my grandchildren, but it certainly does the job. I've ended up sleeping on it and it is quite comfortable. the grandkids have also used it for a step to jump on and off the bigger bed and it has held up to that also. It also folds away and opens like a dream
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Beyond
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed this bed very much. After finding out I was going to have unexpected company in a couple days I stressed in finding a bed for them, instead of the old air mattress we normally use. This prouduct was delivered so quickly and it not only came at an affordable price but it turned out to be the most comfortable bed in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: However the mattress is not that comfortable and slides around slightly
customer_reviews.text: it is merely ok for occasional use. However the mattress is not that comfortable and slides around slightly....
customer_reviews.author: coco90024.

customer_reviews.title: great fold up bed
customer_reviews.text: this bed is great. it folds up so it doesn't take that much room and can be wheeled to other rooms. It is very comfortable. there are no metal bars under the mattress to hurt your back. I was going to buy a small sleeper sofa until I saw this on line. I'm sure glad I didn't buy the sofa. Also I just had to put the wheels on and that was all. The price is great. I would of had to pay a lot more for the sofa. I recommend it very highly.
customer_reviews.author: smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: great extra bed
customer_reviews.text: it is light and easy to move around and the mattress was slept on by one person so far and she said it is fvery firm but comfortable. Was delivered quickly but they delivered it and left it on the sidewalk way out in front of my house instead fo bringing it to the front door - anyone could have picked it up.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: This bed is awesome! I have several health problems that make any ...
customer_reviews.text: This bed is awesome! I have several health problems that make any bed a challenge. I wanted to wait a week after I started using it before I wrote my review. I would recommend this bed to anyone. It sleeps so well and its so easy to put away everyday. Its lightweight and the memory foam mattress with the trampoline style underneath is amazing! Nothing but good zzzz! I hope this review helps!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Simply Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: We own a small, award-winning, boutique inn in Ohio and use this Millard Premium Folding Bed for our twin rollaways - along with the additional topper. Our guests love them. They're light enough that one person can move them around as needed and so well built that either a small or large framed person can get a comfortable night's rest. We own two of them - and will likely be buying two more. Fast shipping and great follow-up by the supplier!!
customer_reviews.author: theinnkeeper

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Had family stay with us and of course the 22 year old 6 and a half tall 200 pound nephew got the folding rollaway bed. He loved it, slept good and told his mom to get one when he visits her. Nice that it folds up easy, no middle uncomfortable bump and stores nice in the corner of the room. Feel I got a great item at a great price. Good quality. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: DawnfromNH

customer_reviews.title: Now both grandkids are happy and I must admit that set up and storage ...
customer_reviews.text: Have twin grandchildren and one Milliard folding bed and one double high Fox twin air mattress. After the kids kept fighting over who would get the air mattress, I purchased a second Milliard folding bed. Now both grandkids are happy and I must admit that set up and storage are easier with the folding bed.. FYI --- they are more like an actual bed than a cot ... very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good extra bed when family visits.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for grandson when he visits..Takes up little room. He says it is very comfortable and he likes it. Puts together in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: marye

customer_reviews.title: Great for part time sleeping!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 60-year old, 120 pound woman who enjoys luxury (think, Four Seasons!) - but this bed has turned out to be perfect for when I visit my parents in assisted living and need to spend the night in the room next to them. The memory foam on top of the mesh provides enough support and it folds up easily to store in a closet. It is well made and arrived quickly. I am grateful to have a sleeping solution in a tough situation. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K.

customer_reviews.title: Great, high quality, comfy spare bed
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality, comfort and ease of use with this little bed. It's great, no complaints. It may be a little narrow for some adults, but the comfort was just fine. It is easy to fold away and store too. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: jaden

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: The frame was bent as soon as we opened it it didn't fold out straight. We thought maybe we needed to put the wheels on so we tried that. However we couldn't put the wheels on because the wheel brackets and the holes in the frame didn't match up so we couldn't get the wheels on. We sent it back, very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.author: Char M

customer_reviews.title: Springs have sprung
customer_reviews.text: It serves the purpose of bedding overnight guest which doesn't happen too often, but after approximately 5 usages, the springs started breaking, how can I have them replaced through the company
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Its like sleeping in a hollow bed almost down to ground. The manufacturer ask me to send pictures how down it goes while i am sleeping
customer_reviews.author: Bobby R

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed. We did have issues with quality of 2 beds but customer service worked hard to correct the situation both times. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this seller and this bed
customer_reviews.text: Item was delivered fast, just as described but had to return for other reasons but thank you! I highly recommend this seller and this bed, it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good nights sleep
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a spare bed for when I stay at my daughters house, night #3 I took the mattress off and used it to pad the floor. It’s extremely narrow, I’m a side sleeper and change positions frequently always felt like I’d fall off the bed.
customer_reviews.author: SherJ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but very low.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely comfortable. One small problem. Very low to the ground. I purchased this for an older person who visits. She loves it. Only problem is she can't get up off of it without help.
customer_reviews.author: S. Surrey

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient Size
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size. Was easy to set up by simply screwing on the wheels. I lay down on it and it seemed reasonably comfortable. It may be a little too soft, but I have not slept on it all night, so I'm not sure. I'll have to wait till I have a guest who might sleep over.
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: poor quality springs but good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: the springs will break as they are very poor quality. I am no Metallurgist but the metal that was used to make the springs for this bed is very thin. I called customer service and they were very polite and are sending us springs to replace the broken ones. Therefore I am changing my review from 1 star to 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mark1021

customer_reviews.title: the bed was packaged very carefully and arrived in perfect condition. Extremely easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: As noted by others, the bed was packaged very carefully and arrived in perfect condition. Extremely easy to set up; a matter of minutes. No one has slept on it overnight as of yet, but from trying it out briefly, I expect it to be very comfortable. In the folded position it takes up very little room in my guest room; looks nice with a pretty quilt thrown over it.
customer_reviews.author: sunstorm56

customer_reviews.title: Bought one of these to test and loved it. Bought a second one and you can't ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these to test and loved it. Bought a second one and you can't beat it for the comfort and convenience. No air pump, blowing it up and then trying to get it back in the bag. Top notch comfort for the size. I tested it personally for five nights and highly recommend it for the proper application.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo Romiti

customer_reviews.title: Great. Great customer service from Manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Great. Great customer service from Manufacturer. Good quality. I have bought two and Yes I would recommend if you are looking for a good quality roll away bed.
customer_reviews.author: Pea Pod

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable !
customer_reviews.text: Superior quality and the comfort is unbelievable. Can't say enough about this bed.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON  A. BREEN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bed!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing... best rollaway bed I have ever slept on. One can't help but get a great nights sleep. I use this bed in my vacation rental as a spare bed when needed and have gotten great feedback from my guests use as well as I know from experience as I have slept on it too. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Mattress is comfy and bed is very light and easy to move
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for my Mother in Law. She loves it. Could be higher but otherwise it's frame is solid and it also has casters which are easy to put on. The mattress is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Fischer

customer_reviews.title: i ordered several of these and two of them fell ...
customer_reviews.text: i ordered several of these and two of them fell apart almost immediately. One bent and the other had a bracket actually break off.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Mattress too hard!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is very hard to fold up but made well and sturdy! Our chief complaint is that the mattress is way too hard! We’ve had to add toppers and feather beds to make it near sleep-able! We are disappointed bc we thought more from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Turner

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to fold up.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use in our extra bedroom, and it's terrific. Well made and easy to fold up and store. The mattress is very comfortable. I slept on it for a week while recovering from surgery so I could be near the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: A. Walls

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT - Easy to fold; Comfy to use
customer_reviews.text: This bed folds up to be very compact an deasy to store, but when you unfold it - WOW! That mattress is awesome and stays awesome! Very comfortable and easy to handle. Very happy with my purchase. It's worth the extra money to get something that is truly comfortable and serves its purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy. It doesn't squeak when you turn over
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed almost 2 months ago and i have used it everyday. It is very sturdy. It doesn't squeak when you turn over. Even though it is thin the mattress is very comfortable. It is very easy to open and close with one person. It was well worth the money. The only change I would make is to make it a little taller when the bed is open it is right below my knees I'm 5"5.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Aileru

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the folding bed
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the folding bed. It is very light and easy to get from one area to another. It arrived earlier than expected and getting the wheels on took just a few seconds. The mattress is foam with a nice soft cover and comfortable but I put another, thin foam roll up mattress over it for more support and I get a comfortable sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great cot!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great cot!!! It is really comfortable!!! You know how usually people say I don't want to sleep on the cot!!! Well everybody wants to sleep on it here!!! I bought it for me to sleep on so my friend who just had bilateral hernia surgery could sleep on my bed. But he rather sleep on cot than my big expensive mattresses!!! He said cot sleeps better than my bed!!! LOL. MY grand daughter loved it to. She said it's like sleeping in heaven!!! LOL. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teressa Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. Worked well for mother when recovering from knee surgery. We needed something comfy so she could sleep on main level of house. After it is folded and kept in walk in closet for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Robbiee69

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love It, bought it for someone recovering from surgery. works great
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic little bed for the price! The memory foam mattress is firm, but like all memory foam it will soften with use. It rolls with ease and opens and closes with no work whatsoever. This is fantastic for unexpected guests!
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: It'll work great for 90% of intended use.
customer_reviews.text: The bed is much better than the usual fold away. It'll probably be just younger people using them, but for adults, I should have ordered one that's a little but thicker mattress and a little higher off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Ga Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, great quality and tough
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly nice - my 280-pound stepson enjoys it immensely (beats the fold-out couch OR the floor ;), and when he's not here, it takes up very little space folded. Moves like it's on air bearings...
customer_reviews.author: Mairi G

product_meta.title: Milliard Premium Folding Bed with Luxurious Memory Foam Mattress – Perfect Guest Bed Featuring a Super Strong Sturdy Frame - Cot Size
product_meta.description:
College students, apartment dwellers, and extended families will appreciate how precious space can be where there is little to be had, but the Milliard Premium Folding Bed can provide comfortable sleeping arrangements in a pinch when visitors spend the night. All you need are pillows, a blanket, and our folding bed to have everything you need to make yourself or your guests comfortable. 

Just wheel the guest bed out, unfold it, and you’re ready to go. The metal frame folds out clamshell-style, so setup is easy, and stabilizing legs at each end are double-reinforced to make sure you don’t go bump in the night. The guest bed includes a supple memory foam mattress with poly deck-style support, which means you’ll get a good night’s sleep. It’s a must-have for dorm rooms, family dens, or attic spaces, since it can be easily set up in living areas when guests stay for the night. When the floor needs to be cleared, the bed easily folds and stows away. 

Assembly is simple, requires no additional tools, and even includes brackets to attach a headboard and footboard for a more permanent setup. The Premium Folding Bed has been produced by Milliard with your comfort and convenience in mind for years of satisfaction. Don’t forget to check out our other great products!
feature_bullets: Features exceptional fit-and-finish. Full-metal bed frame features assisted-folding, double-reinforced stabilizer bars
Includes a memory foam mattress with an extra-soft removable cover. Trampoline bed base is supple, yet supportive.
Clamshell folding pattern secures shut with an adjustable trident buckle for easy opening and closing and for use with other mattresses
Easy assembly – assembly is quick and simple and includes a detailed instruction manual with pictures.
Super strong for adults. Dimensions: L 75 x W 30.5 x H 16 inches. Compact: Folded its just 12 inches thick

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars830 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
